mapper.select:
select t.KPI_CODE "KPI_Code",t.KPI_FULL_NAME "KPI_Name",t.KPI_DESCRIPTION "KPI_Desc",t.IS_MINUS, case t.LABEL_TYPE when 'D' then '日报' when 'M' then '月报' else '其他' end "Acct_Type",1 "KPI_Name_Length" ,case UNIT when '%' then '1' else '0' end IS_PERCENTAGE from DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_COMP_KPI_MAPPING t
where t.IS_VALID='1'

select t.SUBJECT_CODE "Subject_Code",t.SUBJECT_NAME "Subject_Name",t.SUBJECT_DESC "Desc", case t.LABEL_TYPE when '1' then '日报' when '2' then '月报' else '其他' end "Acct_Type",1 "Subject_Name_Length",URL MARKNAME from DW_NEWQUERY_SUBJECT t
select t.ID "Report_Code",t.FILENAME "Report_Name", case t.LABEL_TYPE when '1' then '全部' when '2' then '全部' else '其他' end "Acct_Type" from DW_NEWQUERY_REPORT t
select CHANNEL_TYPE_DESC "searchword", MAPPING_ID "code", CHANNEL_TYPE_DESC "codename", 'channel' "dimensiontype" from DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_BASE_CHANNEL_TYPE
select PRODUCT_DESC "searchword", PRODUCT_ID "code", PRODUCT_DESC "codename", 'product' "dimensiontype" from DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_GJ_PRODUCT
select SERVICE_DESC "searchword", SERVICE_TYPE "code", SERVICE_DESC "codename", 'service' "dimensiontype" from DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_GJ_SERVICE_TYPE
select PRO_NAME "searchword", PROV_ID "code", PRO_NAME "codename", 'pro' "dimensiontype" from DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_PROVINCE

select AREA_SHORT_DESC "searchword", AREA_ID "code", AREA_DESC "codename", 'area' "dimensiontype", p.PRO_NAME "relationpro", p.PROV_ID "relationproid" from DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_AREA a, DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_PROVINCE p where a.PROV_ID = p.PROV_ID

select CHANNEL_TYPE_NAME "searchword", DIMENSION_CODE "code", CHANNEL_TYPE_NAME "codename", case DIMENSION_TYPE_CODE when '1' then 'channel' when '2' then 'product' when '3' then 'service' end "dimensiontype" from DW_NEWQUERY_DIMENSION_NAME where TYPE = '2'
